verses.verse: Judge<WH8199> me<WH3068>, O Lord; for I have walked<WH1980> in my integrity<WH8537>: I have trusted<WH982> also in the Lord<WH3068>; therefore I shall not slide<WH4571>.
Examine<WH974> me<WH3068>, O Lord, and prove<WH5254> me<WH6884>; try my minds<WH3629> and my heart<WH3820>.
For your lovingkindness<WH2617> is before my eyes<WH5869>: and I have walked<WH1980> in your truth<WH571>.
I have not sat<WH3427> with vain<WH7723> persons<WH4962>, neither will I go in<WH935> with dissemblers<WH5956>.
I have hated<WH8130> the congregation<WH6951> of evil doers<WH7489>; and will not sit<WH3427> with the wicked<WH7563>.
I will wash<WH7364> my hands<WH3709> in innocence<WH5356>: so will I compass<WH5437> your altar<WH4196>, O Lord<WH3068>:
That I may publish<WH8085> with the voice<WH6963> of thanksgiving<WH8426>, and tell<WH5608> of all your wondrous works<WH6381>.
Lord<WH3068>, I have loved<WH157> the habitation<WH4583> of your house<WH1004>, and the place<WH4725> where your honor<WH3519> dwells<WH4908>.
Gather<WH622> not my soul<WH5315> with sinners<WH2400>, nor my life<WH2416> with bloody<WH1818> men<WH582>:
In whose hands<WH3027> is mischief<WH2154>, and their right hand<WH3225> is full<WH4390> of bribes<WH7810>.
But as for me<WH3212>, I will walk in my integrity<WH8537>: redeem<WH6299> me<WH2603>, and be merciful unto me.
My foot<WH7272> stands<WH5975> in a even place<WH4334>: in the congregations<WH4721> will I bless<WH1288> the Lord<WH3068>.
